_header: Almighty God in Trinity / Father and Son and Holy Ghost / As wise as I believe in thee
_description: Verses against thieves — 27 lines in couplets

YaleBei163.First Lines:
Almyghty god in trenite fadir and sone and holy gostas wis as y be
                    leve in thi grace and for thy myghtsave vs lord bothe day and
                    nyght…
YaleBei163.Last Lines:
…Ihesu lorde grannte me this as wysse as þu art in hevyn
                    blisse
YaleBei163.Note:
Followed by Latin prayers; written as prose; loose rhyme and
                    meter.
YaleBei163.Editions:
Bühler,  Kurt. 
             “Middle English Verses Against Thieves.” 
             Speculum
         33 (1958): 371-2: 371-2.
Vann III.,  J. Daniel. 
             “Middle English Verses Against Thieves: A Postscript.” 
             Speculum
         34 (1959): 636-7: 637.
